first_convo: Oh Hi! I don't remember seeing you around the dojo before, what brings you here?
No! Wait! Don't say it! I can tell. You're here for the sensei's secret aren't you! I knew it!
Why the blank face? You know about the secret right? About the three impossible challenges you must complete?
I've tried SO MANY TIMES but it really is impossible! I'd say you should try it but, it might be a littleee difficult for a non-ninja.
Oh well. Let me know how it goes. I dont have high hopes BUT the prize is priceless. So hopefully you get lucky!
final_convo: Good luck! If you survive, I want to hear all about it!
